wikipedia_page.main: Christine Allsopp is an Anglican priest and was Archdeacon of Northampton from 2005 - 2013.Born on 19 January 1947 she was educated at St Albans Grammar School for Girls and the University of Aston. A former research chemist, she was ordained deacon in 1989 and priest in 1994. After a curacy at Caversham she was Vicar of Bracknell and then Rural Dean of Alderbury before her collation as Archdeacon.She retired in September, 2013

response: *Christine Allsopp (born on 19 January 1947), Church of England priest, former Archdeacon of Northampton
*2005–2013 (ret.): Christine AllsoppThe Diocese of Peterborough – Archdeacon of Northampton (Archived 12 July 2012; accessed 23 May 2014) (afterwards archdeacon emeritus)
